sentences.en: A distinction was made between Harris growth arrest lines and zebra lines.
sentences.cn: 在有些病人中同样可以看到存在于骨干与骨突部位的区带.

sentences.en: A zebra has black stripes.
sentences.cn: 斑马有黑色的条纹.

sentences.en: a zebra's black and white stripes
sentences.cn: 斑马的黑白条纹

sentences.en: A zebra's stripes help this animal hide from its enemies.
sentences.cn: 斑马条纹有助它们避开天敌.

sentences.en: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.cn: 可是如果那匹马突然长出了斑马的条纹呢？

sentences.en: Go down to the intersection cross at the zebra crossing.
sentences.cn: 你应该到十字路口那边走斑马线.

sentences.en: It may be able to retrieve obscure texts on, say, the classification procedures for African zebra variants, but be incapable of producing anything sensible about animals in general.
sentences.cn: 它也许能查出为非洲斑马变种进行分类这样晦涩难懂的课本文字，却找不出任何有关一般动物的合乎情理的描述。

sentences.en: It's got rhinestones and zebra stripes on it.
sentences.cn: 上面有人造钻石,还是斑马条的.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore expression of EBV - LMPI and ZEBRA in B cell in SLE patients.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨EBV - LMP1和ZEBRA在系统性红斑狼疮患者(SLE)的表达情况.

sentences.en: Results: Expression of EBV - LMP 1 and ZEBRA in SLE patients was higher than normal control P < 0.01.
sentences.cn: 结果: SLE患者B淋巴细胞 中EBV - LMP1和ZEBRA的表达显著高于正常对照组(P<0.01).

sentences.en: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison , water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.cn: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.en: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.cn: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.en: The entire body of a zebra is marked with black and whitish stripes.
sentences.cn: 斑马的全身都有黑白条纹.

sentences.en: The lions devoured a zebra in a short time.
sentences.cn: 狮子一会儿就吃掉了一匹斑马.

sentences.en: The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.
sentences.cn: 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。

sentences.en: The novice says stutteringly: I think he is a zebra a zebra!
sentences.cn: 新手结结巴巴地说: “我以为他是斑马! ”

sentences.en: The quagga was a strikingly beautiful variant of the zebra.
sentences.cn: 斑驴是一种极美丽的斑马变种。

sentences.en: The routing functions , which are customized in on - demand , are implemented by open source Zebra.
sentences.cn: 路由功能利用源代码开放软件Zebra实现.

sentences.en: The shy okapi – which resembles a cross between a zebra and a giraffe –was first discovered in the Democratic Republic of Congo in 1901.
sentences.cn: 害羞的欧卡皮鹿是外形界于斑马和长颈鹿之间的一种动物，1901年在刚果民主共和国首次被发现。

sentences.en: There are several species of zebra.
sentences.cn: 斑马有好几种.

sentences.en: Those combinations are as unique to each zebra as fingerprints are to humans.
sentences.cn: 每一匹斑马的条纹线组合都是独一无二的，就像人类的指纹一样。

sentences.en: Topcoat: gantry walking agencies paint yellow - and black zebra crossings.
sentences.cn: 面漆: 龙门架行走机构油漆成黑黄 相间 斑马线.

phrases.tran_cn: [鱼]斑马鱼（一种有斑马条纹的胎生观赏鱼）

trans.tran_en: an animal that looks like a horse but has black and white lines all over its body
